title: Mo’ Money Mo’ Problems (Original)
lyrics:
[Intro: Kelly Price]
I'm coming out
I'm coming
I'm coming out
I'm coming
[Chorus: Kelly Price]
I don't know what they want from me
It's like the more money we come across
The more problems we see
I don't know what they want from me
It's like the more money we come across
The more problems we see
[Verse 1: The Notorious B.I.G.]
B-I-G P-O-P-P-A
No info for the DEA
Federal agents mad ‘cause I'm flagrant
Tap my cell and the phone in the basement
My team supreme, stay clean
Triple beam lyrical dream, I bе that
Cat you see at all events bent
Gats in holstеrs, girls on shoulders
Playboy, I told ya, mere mics to me
Bruise too much, I lose too much
Step on stage, the girls boo too much
I guess it's ‘cause you run with lame dudes too much
Me lose my touch? Never that!
If I did, ain't no problem to get the gat
Where the true players at? Throw your Rolies in the sky
Wave 'em side to side and keep your hands high
While I give your girl the eye, player, please
Lyrically, niggas see B.I.G be flossin’
Jig on the cover of Fortune, 5-double-O
Here's my phone number, your man ain't got to know
I got the dough, got the flow down pizat
Platinum plus like thizat
Dangerous on trizacks, leave your ass flizat

[Chorus: Kelly Price]
I don't know what they want from me
It's like the more money we come across
The more problems we see
I don't know what they want from me
It's like the more money we come across
The more problems we see
[Verse 2: Jadakiss]
It's pitiful, everything's political
But now I got more rounds, so all y'all get a few
You know the shit I stay on
Pony-skin blazer with the shades on
Goodfella, Bad Boy in yay's home
We ain't gon' never stop blazin'
I put that on Jason Jaywan (Uh)
In the A4 with the MKs on (Uh huh)
Wave the pick, get the drop laid for him
First day that it hit the shelf, pay for him
Pray for him, so everything be OK for him
'Cause besides us, everybody else shit borin', uh
Thank God for somethin'
Just made the board so I'm comin'
Keep the car runnin'
Back to the paper route, no doubt
You know what it's about

[Chorus: Kelly Price]
I don't know what they want from me
It's like the more money we come across
The more problems we see
I don't know what they want from me
It's like the more money we come across
The more problems we see
